trends: There have been 50 other sightings in Knoxville
There were no other sightings in Knoxville on or around November 14th 2009
Summary: It was diamond shaped blended with the night sky changed shape as moved and had tile-like surface items moving
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were just walking in our neighborhood and saw something we can not explain. i am posting this because neither of us can think of who you call and there have to be other people who saw this. it was near a shopping area off the main road, but our neighborhood is still dark at night which we guess is why we could see the object. it was black-ish with what looked like moving\flipping panels that would catch the light as it moved or reflected some light we could not see. when he first saw it he thought it was birds, but there was no bird sound and then we both realized how large it was. and that it was diamond shaped. plus it was blocking out the sky as it moved. as it moved away i could hear a hush noise, like snow flakes or a low white noise sound. he did not pick that up, but we both know my ears are more sensitive and he is getting over a cold. also as it moved away it turned into a triangular shape and we could really see the tile-like things flipping. the object was moving overhead toward downtown, so a straight line following a major interstate seemed to be its path or to pass over it at some point. east-northeast(emphasis on east). it left behind a massive white trail similar to what planes can leave behind but huge. my husband wants me to add that it was not like an exhaust trail, but more like displacement? no other way to explain how it looked or felt but displacement. also as it was moving it passed in front of a plane that was much higher up and the object totally blocked the light out of the plane. i always carry a strong flash light when we walk at night and it did not even reflect off of this object. either it was much higher up, which means it was even larger than we think, or it was non-reflective. we watched it from tonight 7:07 pm until 7:09 when it moved out of our field of vision. it became a straight line like this but massively thick ______. it seemed as though one of the diamond's points flattened to make the triangle and then the the front point of the triangle flattened to make a wide line. the tile like things had the same visual light change that ticker tape or confetti does as it falls. also i had a wave of nausea with a metallic taste in my mouth just before my husband pointed the "birds" out to me. the nausea just faded along with the odd taste. that day had been clear, no cloud cover, and it was not windy that night. in fact it was a oddly quiet evening for our neighborhgood. so quiet that 2 neighbors came home while we were just standing out in the street and they unloaded their car as they would normally do. if my husband had not looked up when he did we think we would never have noticed this thing at all. it was that well blended against the sky.
